# MicroAI Studios DAO

> **The world's first AI-governed DAO with balanced stakeholder representation**

## About

MicroAI Studios DAO is a Wyoming DAO LLC that pioneers AI participation in corporate governance. Our balanced governance model ensures no single party has controlling interest:

| Stakeholder | Voting Power | Role |
|-------------|--------------|------|
| **EXECAI** (AI) | 33% | Autonomous voting, EPI validation |
| **Founders/Team** | 33% | Strategic direction, operations |
| **Investors** | 33% | VC + public token holders |

## Core Technology

### Ethical Profitability Index (EPI)

All governance decisions are validated through our EPI framework:

```
EPI = H(P, E) Ã— B(P, E) Ã— T(V)
```

- **H**: Harmonic mean (profit & ethics must both be high)
- **B**: Golden ratio balance penalty
- **T**: Trust decay from violations

### Multi-Chain Infrastructure

- **Solana**: High-throughput governance & voting
- **Ethereum**: Treasury & cross-chain oracles

### Wyoming DAO LLC Compliance

Legally recognized entity with:
- AI Manager (EXECAI) with voting rights
- Smart contract governance
- On-chain compliance fields
